external_references.description: Cybereason Nocturnus. (2022, May 4). Operation CuckooBees: Deep-Dive into Stealthy Winnti Techniques. Retrieved September 22, 2022.

description: During [Operation CuckooBees](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0012), the threat actors used the legitimate Windows services `IKEEXT` and `PrintNotify` to side-load malicious DLLs.(Citation: Cybereason OperationCuckooBees May 2022)
